Zanzibar Nature
The Kawa Foundation Kawa
Kawa Foundation Information The Kawa Foundation aims to preserve cultural, environmental and historical heritage of Zanzibar. We educate students in the tourism industry. Come visit us (Mo-Fri 9am-5pm): Kiponda Street Zanzibar TZ, 3612, Tanzania +255777957995 info@kawatrainingcenter.com
